duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quick and friendly service to customers, including taking orders and processing payments efficiently.
Cleaning tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant to maintain cleanliness and hygiene standards.
Following proper safety procedures when handling and/or preparing food.
Being a team player and assisting other crew members with tasks and assignments to ensure continuity of service.
Working under pressure and at a fast pace to meet the demands of the restaurant environment.
Balancing working hard and having fun, aligning with the culture of the restaurant.
